original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business operations and technical implementation, requiring a unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency. As the Configuration Specialist, you will play a pivotal part in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate at peak efficiency. Your focus will be on developing new processes and solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to drive innovation and optimization.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to understand business requirements, document them thoroughly using techniques like user stories and process flows, and translate them into effective system configurations.
- Develop and maintain detailed configuration specifications for our core [mention specific system] backend, including data mappings, integrations, and implementation.
- Implement, test, and troubleshoot new configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) as needed.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, leveraging data querying, reporting, and visualization tools.
- Recommend and implement configuration changes and best practices to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements.
- Work in close partnership with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to understand complex business requirements and devise effective technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities to work effectively with cross-functional teams
- Talent for translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in SQL and experience with data analysis and visualization tools

Preferred Skills:
- Familiarity with Java programming language
- Experience with Agile methodologies and project management best practices

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a similar role, blending business analysis and technical configuration responsibilities
- Proven track record of successfully implementing configuration changes and improvements within complex enterprise systems

Preferred Experience:
- Experience in the vehicle configuration domain, with a deep understanding of the associated business processes and challenges
- Exposure to the application of machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques to optimize business processes and system performance

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration tools
- SQL, data querying, and reporting tools
- Agile project management software and collaboration platforms

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with frequent stakeholder interactions
- Ability to work in an Agile, iterative manner, adapting to changing requirements and priorities
- Strong attention to detail and commitment to thorough testing and documentation
- Willingness to learn and apply new technologies and methodologies as needed

Role Overview:
As the Configuration Specialist, you will play a pivotal role in bridging the gap between our business operations and technical infrastructure. This position requires a unique combination of business acumen and technical proficiency, enabling you to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations that drive efficiency and accuracy. Your primary focus will be on developing innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging the power of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to optimize our systems and processes.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and ensure they are accurately reflected in our [mention specific system] backend configurations.
- Design, develop, and maintain comprehensive configuration specifications for our core systems, including data mappings, integrations, and implementation procedures.
- Implement new configurations, thoroughly test them to verify compliance with requirements, and participate in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the system's functionality.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, leveraging data querying, reporting, and visualization tools to uncover insights and drive optimization.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to recommend and implement configuration changes and best practices that streamline business processes and enhance system performance.
- Maintain detailed documentation of system configurations, troubleshooting steps, and process improvements to support ongoing operations and future enhancements.
- Serve as a technical liaison, working closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities to understand complex business requirements and devise effective technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams
- Demonstrated talent for translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in SQL and experience with data analysis and visualization tools

Preferred Skills:
- Familiarity with Java programming language
- Experience with Agile methodologies and project management best practices

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a similar role, blending business analysis and technical configuration responsibilities
- Track record of successfully implementing configuration changes and improvements within complex enterprise systems

Preferred Experience:
- Expertise in the vehicle configuration domain, with a deep understanding of the associated business processes and challenges
- Hands-on experience in applying machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques to optimize business processes and system performance

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration tools
- SQL, data querying, and reporting tools
- Agile project management software and collaboration platforms

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with frequent stakeholder interactions
- Ability to work in an Agile, iterative manner, adapting to changing requirements and priorities
- Strong attention to detail and commitment to thorough testing and documentation
- Willingness to continuously learn and apply new technologies and methodologies as needed

Role Overview:
This Configuration Specialist role is a unique opportunity to blend your business acumen and technical proficiency to drive innovation and optimization within our vehicle configuration systems. As a key member of our team, you will be responsible for understanding complex business processes, translating them into effective system configurations, and leveraging the power of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to enhance efficiency and accuracy. Your work will have a direct impact on the performance and functionality of our core [mention specific system] backend, ensuring it accurately reflects the evolving needs of our business.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather comprehensive business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and ensure they are accurately reflected in our system configurations.
- Design, develop, and maintain detailed configuration specifications for our [mention specific system] backend, including data mappings, integrations, and implementation procedures.
- Implement new configurations, rigorously test them to verify compliance with requirements, and participate in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the system's functionality.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, leveraging data querying, reporting, and visualization tools to uncover insights and drive optimization.
- Work with cross-functional teams to recommend and implement configuration changes and best practices that streamline business processes and enhance system performance.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, troubleshooting steps, and process improvements to support ongoing operations and future enhancements.
- Serve as a technical liaison, collaborating closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities to understand complex business requirements and devise effective technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams
- Demonstrated talent for translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in SQL and experience with data analysis and visualization tools

Preferred Skills:
- Familiarity with Java programming language
- Experience with Agile methodologies and project management best practices

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a similar role, blending business analysis and technical configuration responsibilities
- Proven track record of successfully implementing configuration changes and improvements within complex enterprise systems

Preferred Experience:
- Deep expertise in the vehicle configuration domain, with a comprehensive understanding of the associated business processes and challenges
- Hands-on experience in applying machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques to optimize business processes and system performance

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration tools
- SQL, data querying, and reporting tools
- Agile project management software and collaboration platforms

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with frequent stakeholder interactions
- Ability to work in an Agile, iterative manner, adapting to changing requirements and priorities
- Strong attention to detail and commitment to thorough testing and documentation
- Willingness to continuously learn and apply new technologies and methodologies as needed
